message.body: Do you want me to pick up Mothers Day card when I go to Wegmans after unemployment appt this afternoon?
We can bring Sansa to bed & biscuit for Friday through Saturday, she has an opening. Got to get back to her asap so what do you think?
Are you serious? How much is that? I don't really want to pay for 2 days.
I don't have an extra $50 bucks. To waste. And Sansa wants to go to Canada too.
Why did you already book it?
She called me back with message that there was a spot for her & if It changes to call back. No big deal
Just realized she has no pick up on Saturday evening or Sunday mornings. Should of read the brochure better
